t: Fear missing out? Amazon knows it—and uses it to make Prime Day sales
s: July 15, 2019 - The FOMO Amazon creates with Prime Day also gives people a sense of urgency, Meyvis said. "It's special because it only happens once a year," Meyvis said. "There are so many brands and retailers that have promotions all the time — often times you don't have a sense of urgency."
